item.description:
Frohes Neues Jahr alle Zusammen!

To start of the new year I would like to call into life a monthly STAMMTISCH so we will have at least one reoccurring event a month. I thought this event could take place every third Thursday of the month at the RIRA's Irish pub or at the Trinity Brewhouse alternatively. I hope this day will work for the most of you!

So come by for a bite to eat or a pint to drink and to have some good talks with Germans or German minded people. I would love to see you all again - especially all our new members whom I haven't met yet!

Hoffe, viele haben Zeit und Lust f√ºr einen Stammtisch! Bis ganz bald!

- Hanna -
item.name: Monthly Stammtisch!!!
